page.title: 18EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS
page.content: pupils aged 11 to 18. In 1979 the Sixth Form Federation with Richard Challoner Boys' School started. SPECIAL SCHOOL {Cambridge House School}is run by Merton Council for pupils with reading difficulties and health problems. It has a maximum of 30 pupils aged 5 to l2. At present there are only boys. INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS {Rokeby School}was founded in Wimble- don in 1877 and moved to George Road, K.O.T. in 1966. It is a boys' prepa- ratory school for 322 pupils between the ages 4 and 13. {Holy Cross Preparatory School}was opened in 1972 for girls aged 3 to ll years and is run by the Holy Sisters. {King's College School}in Southside, S.W.19 moved from the Strand in 1904. The main building is called South Hayes. The Great Hall is a recent
